alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 30 at 2:52PM CDT until April 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning, moderate to heavy snowfall expected throughout the day on Friday. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Near blizzard conditions possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 7 AM CDT Friday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 7 AM Friday to 4 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the weekend commutes. Near blizzard conditions will be possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
